content: this bucket hat is one-size-fits-many with a finished circumference of about 22 it is made with 5 granny squares for the crown topped by another modified granny square and then finished with a brim yardages needed main color mc blue- 87 yds contrast color 1 cc1 white- 21 yds contrast color 2 cc2 red- 31 yds pictured hat was made with big twist value in blue and mainstays 100% acrylic yarn in red and white
